messages.subject: Re:blue ribbon schools
messages.msgSnippet: It seems a lot of people think a better school is more strict, has higher standards .  I met a mom who is very proud that her kids kindergarten class is so
messages.messageBody:
It seems a lot of people think a better school is more strict, "has
higher standards". I met a mom who is very proud that her kids
kindergarten class is so strict bc the children know what the rules
are???? They get sticks for breaking rules and aren't even allowed to
talk in the bathroom!! This is at a private school in our community.
Seems to me it just sets up more kids for failure.
I also know two hs families who live right next to a school. They use
the playground after school hours.
Mary Ellen
One can never have too many buttons.
Laurella Lederer
